attributes.action: Prime minister to appear on Good morning Britain and interviewed by Piers Morgan
attributes.additional_details: As an elected official the prime minister is accountable to all the British people, I expect that they should be held accountable to all not just those news agencies they like or can control.
attributes.background: The government are accountable to the British public and as such should not boycott a news outlet for fear of not liking the questions. Stand accountable for your decisions to all the British public.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that request actions by individual Ministers, including the Prime Minister, but have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require the government to accept all requests for broadcast interviews: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329807
